title: Michael Bream (EVWest, electric Bonneville car)
description:
Michael Bream is the founder of EV West. a company that is building an electric Bonneville car. They also that puts electric powertrains in your favorite cars. They've converted Ferraris, Porsches, drift cars,dune buggies, VWs,, and more. 

https://www.evwest.com

Follow the build @electracliner

 

Follow us!

IG:  @michaelbream @electraliner @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

T: @michaelbream @electraliner @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/Uz51QE8EYkM
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
